subtitle.translate: Of course there would be a questline about Create...

description: I bet you heard about /6/Create/6/ mod. It is awesome. Or not, depending on what you like in minecraft mod. As any other mod it is not essential to progress this pack, since it is not an expert pack.
But avoiding /6/Create/6/ in this pack would be suboptimal. It has a lot of addons in this pack, incluing ore extraction vein and in general nice to have to start a game.

Create is one on addons that don't received penalty for moving items, so you can use it for moving item, breaking and placing blocks, etc. Just take a note that using CC:T for this is much more efficient, especially for item transfer.
